name: Indeedee ♂
description: The Emotion Pokémon. It uses the horns on its head to sense the emotions of others. Males will act as valets for those they serve, looking after their every need.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to flinching.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: If this Pokémon becomes burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, its attacker receives the negative status condition as well (if not immune).

abilities.name: Psychic Surge
abilities.description: If the move is known, this Pokémon may use the Psychic Terrain move as a bonus action.
